verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kahe,-kāli kāśī-miśrera ghare
prabhu yāibena, tāhāṅ milāba sabāre

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya kahe—the Bhaṭṭācārya replied; kāli—tomorrow; kāśī-miśrera ghare—in the house of Kāśī Miśra; prabhu—the Lord; yāibena—will go; tāhāṅ—there; milāba sabāre—I shall arrange for a meeting with all of you.
translation: The Bhaṭṭācārya replied to the people, "Tomorrow the Lord will be at the house of Kāśī Miśra. I shall arrange for you all to meet Him."
